thread.title: 2 Weeks In A Row With Crap Games On TV
thread.title_full: 2 Weeks In A Row With Crap Games On TV

author: NJCardFan
title: 2 Weeks In A Row With Crap Games On TV
text: 2 Weeks In A Row With Crap Games On TV User Name 1:00pm(FOX)-Philly/Washington(if it's even played as Hurricane Joaquin might be battering the DC area by Sunday) 4:00pm(FOX)-GB/SF (CBS)-CLE/SD And look at the map at the link and someone please explain to me why a small piece of NE Arkansas is getting the Panthers/Bucs while the rest of the state gets the Giants/Buffalo(which, for some reason is the national game). "Begin with the end in mind and die empty." -A-Dub #35 And thing I tell everyone else (DirecTV) Originally Posted by Shane And thing I tell everyone else (DirecTV) DirecTV is not a financial option. I'll just have to watch the game on my computer again. "Begin with the end in mind and die empty." -A-Dub #35 Here in AZ we just get one game: Rams at Cardinals - at UOP (in person). "In coach Arians' car, there is no cruise control." - Larry Fitzgerald Originally Posted by Brian in Mesa Here in AZ we just get one game: Rams at Cardinals - at UOP (in person). Really? Because according to the map, AZ is getting Buffalo/NYG, KC/Cincy too. "Begin with the end in mind and die empty." -A-Dub #35 Posts: 705 There is only one game per weekend worth watching. Everything else is noise. Heard that the Cardinals just aren't 'sexy'. They must be crazy. Every player on this team is a star and is someone you'd want to take home to mother. Age: 36 Posts: 4,702 The late Fox game has three top teams to choose from: Arizona, Green Bay & Denver. The Arizona game is the least broadcast of the 3. The Cardinals/Rams game won't be shown in the areas surrounding Arizona (Cali, New Mexico, Nevada, Utah) & even in parts of Arizona (NE corner of the state). I'm a little surprised they aren't showing the Rams games in LA... I guess they're worried that people might not buy season tickets once the Rams get moved there once they see them get destroyed by the Cardinals? Originally Posted by Shane And thing I tell everyone else (DirecTV) I love me some directv. The only commercials I watch now are the ones for the cardinals game Location: Pigskin Slaughter House-Smithfield, VA Age: 46 I'm just hoping Hurricane Joaquin doesn't screw with my ability to see the game. yea, yea yea, hope everyone else affected stays safe too. "In sports, we have a tendency to overuse terms like courage, bravery and heroes. Then someone special like Pat Tillman comes along and reminds us of what those terms really mean." - Michael Bidwill Originally Posted by Brian in Mesa Here in AZ we just get one game: Rams at Cardinals - at UOP (in person). Yup and there is Vegas with the 49ers game this week but not last week.
